name: Frank Woolley
bowling: Left-arm medium Slow left-arm Left-arm medium Slow left-arm orthodox

First-class.deliveries: 94,949CricInfo gives a figure of 94,949 for the number of balls Woolley bowled during his career. https://www.espncricinfo.com/player/frank-woolley-22518 Frank Woolley, CricInfo. Retrieved 28 September 2010.  CricketArchive gives an alternative figure of 94,794, https://cricketarchive.com/Archive/Players/0/316/316.html Frank Woolley, CricketArchive. Retrieved 27 December 2021. subscription  whilst Derek Carlaw gives a figure of 94,824. Carlaw, p. 602.  Howard Milton, in his statistical analysis for the Association of Cricket Statisticians and Historians, gives a figure of 15,511 six-ball overs and 235 eight-ball overs, equating to a total of 94,946 balls. Milton 1998, p. 106.
